Feeling pretty disappointed over here. I was gifted a headband/blanket Quest set and LOVED what I received. The fabric was stretchy, the headband was adjustable. They washed wonderfully. Loved it.

I decided to purchase a bunch more to add to my baby's accessories- I bought three different packs, and was excited for the headbands to arrive.

However, I was extremely disappointed to find that not all of these products are made the same.

Over half of the headbands I received were NOT adjustable. They were two separate pieces of fabric- one as the headband, and one that made the knot. That's a huge downside to me. The entire reason I bought them was so they could grow with my child.

The other half were one, long strip of fabric. Unfortunately, the color options weren't as pleasing to me.

To top it off, some of the products I received were clearly already opened, as well as had stray threads and holes already developing.

All in all, I'm just disappointed. I really wish the products were consistent and dependable. I will either have to settle or shop elsewhere.

These headbands are adorable! They are several patterns / colors to choose from so finding one to match a particular outfit is made easy. I was happy with the quality of these headbands once they arrived. Quality seems to vary widely when purchasing online, especially when manufactured over seas. Luckily these headbands are well made and the elastic is strong. These won't losen their hold after a couple uses like other brands I've tried. The only bad thing with these is there are a little too big for newborns. These likely won't fit well until about 6 months, maybe even 9 months old. I tried them on my 5 year old and they are workable but rather tight for her. So I'd say 6 months - 4 years is the likely recommended age. Either way these headbands are cute so even a little lose on a young one is good for pictures.

reviewText: I received my package of Quest Sweet Baby's Headbands, Girl's Headbands on time and packaged nicely. They are lovely headbands that are of a nice quality, actually better than I expected. It is a package of eight different colors as shown and they are made of a nice bright fabric. At first I thought that they were a bit on the small side but after careful examination I realized that I could probably wear them if I wanted to. They will make perfect little gifts for any little girl. They are really quite cute and the color selection is nice. The fabric is a bit slippery but only time will tell if they are going to slip off on there own. Overall I like this product and might even wear them myself!  I received this product for free or  at a discounted price for my honest and unbiased review. I really rely on other peoples reviews so I would never give a good review to a bad product for any reason.

I am super excited about these because they are so adorable! On arrival they came in a sealed bag and then each headband was individually wrapped. The material is super soft and has a small elastic piece inside so they are somewhat stretchy. My little ones have trouble wearing some headbands as they are always a little snug, but these fit them perfectly! The rabbit ears are adjustable in size, you can actually take off that piece of cloth/ears, and adjust the size of the ears depending on how big of a knot you tie. Or another cute option is that you can take off the ears completely and just have a solid band, but there is a gathering of the material where the ears tie so you would have to flip it to the other side for a smooth band. However, I plan on using the little ears because they are precious and the colors are great, somewhat of a vintage and retro vibe. The styles that I received are as pictured. I received this product at a discount for my honest review so I hope this helps those looking for some sweet and stylish headbands.

By my own fault I didn't pay attention that these are for toddlers, and I bought them for my newborn. Needless to say they don't fit yet. But they are well made, and very soft, so I know we will love them once she grows into them :)
summary: Will be perfect once they fit my little girl

reviewText:
These headbands are super adorable!  They are made of a super stretchy and soft material with beautiful patterns.  I had read some reviews that stated that the headbands were a little big and are more for toddlers than for babies, but I've tried them on my 10 day old infant, and they seem to fit just fine.  They weren't tight, but certainly were not too big.  In fact, they looked quite adorable on her.  These headbands are so cute, I really wish they made them in my size!  I love all of the floral patterns and they seem like they would be incredibly comfortable to wear!  I may have to try making larger ones for myself :)  It is a great value too!  You get six headbands for the low list price!  As for the quality, they seem to be made of high quality soft, stretchy fabric and are sewn well.  Definitely a great deal!  I would highly recommend these headbands to anyone with a little girl!

DISCLAIMER: I received this product for free or at a significant discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

These headbands work great for my two month old. They go on easily and comfortably. I was looking for comfy headbands that didn't leave marks on her head and they certainly fit the bill. I love the patterns. They make a solid colored onsie an adorable outfit. I plan on ordering more for sure!

I ordered this set of baby rabbit ear headdress turbans on May 27, 2016 with no rush shipping and it was delivered on June 1, 2016. It was packaged nicely and was easy to open. It came in a box along with other items that I have purchased. It looks exactly like the posted picture.
One of the best rewards of having a daughter is being able to dress her up like a model. It is similar to having a real doll sized version of me. My little girl is already five years old and she is growing more and more beautiful each day. She is getting old enough where she is dressing herself. There were eight pieces of colorful rabbit ear headdress turban in this set. The product description said that the turbans can fit 2-10 year old girls. The elasticity of the turban is stretchy enough to fit my daughters head comfortably. The turbans are made of a soft cotton material. The colors and patterns are vibrant and the craftsmanship on these turbans is superb. This set of turbans have a good variety of patterns for creating fun vintage looks. I may be bias but in my own opinion I think that my daughter looks undeniably gorgeous adorning these on her head. She really enjoys picking out and matching her own outfits with the hair accessories and shoes. It is always fun to see what she has chosen to wear for our family adventures.

Attached are photos of this set of rabbit ear headdress turbans.

I love these flower headbands!! I ordered them for my 11 month old daughter and they are the cutest things ever! The material is a soft, thick (in a good way), nice material with vibrant colors. They fit my 11 month old - but my husband also put one on his head and it fit (not comfortably of course, but it stayed on) so there is a lot of stretch to the material. They are made with just one criss cross on the top that twists and allows for the sides to be open a little bit or fully covered. They are a little bit wider than what I would like personally for my little girl - but I think that's just a personal preference and as she gets a little bigger it will fit her more like I want (and it may different once she has hair).  I would totally buy these again - and will if the come out with other designs in the future!

I've been looking for something to help tame my 18 month old's unruly hair (or at least distract from it) so I decided to try these. Unfortunately she doesn't tolerate headbands for long and these were no exception. The prints are a little more similar to each other than I was expecting. There are 2 prints with 3 different shades of each. They are made out of a flat knit fabric that has been rolled and sewn into a headband. A bow has then been folded and sewn together. The two pieces are held together by a little ring of fabric to cover up the seams. The bow does pull out of the headband with little difficulty (a fact my daughter noticed right away), but the bow is easy to put back together and looks nice dismantled as well. They are very soft and stretchy. If your child will tolerate hats and headbands, I'm sure they will look adorable.

reviewText:
Very cute floral cloth headbands! I really like how they are a soft jersey stretch material that won't leave the little one with headband marks. Just so  you know the bow is smaller than the one on the baby model it's the size of the other images so it's about 1/3 the size of the model's bow. I don't mind the size of the bow. The patterns are better in person than online. I've already placed them in the wash and they did just fine especially for the price. The colors are pretty versatile and will pair well with most girls solid color onesies.

One thing to call out but it does not bother me that much is that in order to make the bow stiff they have a metal wire on one side of the inside of the bow. It should not cause any distress or discomfort to the baby but it is something to look out for and without it the bow would not keep it's shape.

Please note I did receive a discount to provide an honest review.

The first reason I love this headbands is that it's fabric is soft. The softness is important since it will provide comfort wear for my daughter. In addition, it's stretchable so it doesn't leave visible marked on head if its too small. It fits my daughter just fine now but once she grew a little I would just stretch it by pulling it so it stretch a little bigger before letting her wear it. The seam and stitching of the headband is smooth so when my daughter wears it on and takes it off it doesn't leave any marked around her head, some headbands stitching can be thick and leave a mark after wearing. I would say this headbands are for babies one year and up, it will be too big for newborns or even 6 months of age, you'd have to clip it or shorten it. It's very cute and my daughter received a lot of compliment while wearing it. I only wish that the package has more variety prints. Overall, these are really nice headbands. Please note that I did received this product for free or at a discounted rate in exchange for my unbiased and honest opinion.

These Quest Sweet Bow Headbands are adorable. The set I ordered comes with seven cute floral prints with a variety of colors which maximizes their use. The day they arrived we opened them and tried them out. The headband is made of a fabric that is soft to the touch and has a good amount of stretch and give making it easy to put on and stay put. The bow portion of the headband is a separate piece of fabric, knotted around the headband, with some wire inside which helps hold its shape without any fuss. The width of the headband can be adjusted by scrunching together the fabric or stretching it out. My daughter even wore to dance class without it coming off. I am very impressed with these adorable headbands. I received this product at a discount in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

These are so cute. I absolutely love polka dots, and thought these would look absolutely adorable on my niece. There are 7 headbands in all, and the patterns will go great with almost any outfit. I would absolutely recommend these, they are super cute.

The front is an ok length and covers just enough skin but the back has a slight upward curve cut out of it that allows your panties and butt to be seen. Now for anyone that watches anime this isn't news but for someone who's going to try to wear this out ... FORGET IT. Then I tried it on which was easier said than done it took 5 mins to pull this skirt over my thighs hips and butt and I don't even have a butt! Then I tried to zip it up it stopped 2 inches from the top and would not zip over the rest of my body. I wear a size 10 or a L in normal high waisted skirts so I ordered up to the XL and I felt like I was wearing a child's skirt IF YOU ARE A LARGE OR XL LADY DO NOT BUY THIS. So because I was just excited to have it I left it zipped as much as I could and said "eh I can deal with it" and moved on to the shirt. The short sleeve shirts for this product are made of a stretchy spandex material which I am so happy about otherwise this shirt wouldn't have fit. Its tight and hugs you and I would probably never wear it with anything that didn't cover my tummy because thus shirt highlights all the rolls but its still a cute outfit and it's still going to work for what I bought it for. If your a m-L I would get XL but if you're a L and up just don't even buy it

reviewText: Not of great quality. Zip came off in just a few weeks time
GREAT ITEM, GREAT SELLER

I really like this wallet, it has so many slots for cards, bills, checks, etc. And it even has a zipper pocket you can use for bills, change, or to hold your phone. It's extremely thin which is great because I was looking for something that wasn't going to make my purse bulky or something I could throw into a small crossbody bag but still have room for everything in it. The only problems (and they're small and easy to get over, which is why I gave it 4 stars)  is that on the little part you pull out there are two slots that look like they're made for SD cards (and my nook case has SD card slots which is why I figured that's what they were)  but when I tried to put SD cards in them they didn't fit. I don't know what else would go in these slots? My other problem was that when I took it out of the bag it smelled a little the way many new products smell (kind of like new leather boots would smell)  but after I left it out over night it went away. The last and final problem (and I leave this last because it may have been my fault)  the portion that pulls out has these black streaks on it like pulling it put actually damages that part of the wallet. I don't know if it was like that when I got it or if I maybe pulled it out too forcefully or something. I haven't had time to see if I'm able to clean it off yet but I was disappointed to have it for a few hours and it already be "damaged". Aside from those three miniscule problems (and one goes away,  and the other two are probably my fault)  I absolutely love it and I'm probably going to buy one in another color, or one of the other small ones this seller has with a similar look so I can switch them out and whatnot. Would definitely recommend and would most definitely buy again!
summary: So great aside from a few "problems"!

reviewText: I love the fact that it allows me to wear my pre-pregnancy pants unbuttoned/unzipped and smooths things out so no one tell...

Do yourself a favor and spend the extra ten bucks or so for the Everyday BellaBand with the silicone strip. This one is basically a stretchy nylon tube top that you wear around your hips and stomach, with nothing to anchor it at the top or the bottom- if you move around at all it will roll up. I got one of these and one of the nicer bands with the silicone strip, and find that I wear the nicer one exclusively- it has gotten me through to my 5th month so far without having to buy actual maternity pants. When I do forget to wash it and resort to this one, I spend all day tugging and unrolling and generally wondering why I haven't thrown this one in the trash yet. Guess I'm saving it to wear as an actual tube top postpartum!
summary: Do yourself a favor and spend the extra ten bucks ...

reviewText: This band is a good alternative to the more expensive Bella band. The biggest difference is the stay-put strip at the bottom that the Bella Band has but this one does not. The fit is good, though, so I don't feel like I needed it. Comfortable, and no riding up when I wore it to work.
These bands are a hassle.  Have to keep adjusting it, so I caved and just bought maternity jeans instead of messing around with this band.

It seems expensive for a piece of stretchy fabric until you consider that you don't have to purchase several pairs of maternity pants - just unbutton your normal ones, pull the band over and breathe easy (literally). Post pregnancy, this band is super useful too. The first time around I tried a couple different brands but this was the only one I didn't have issues with - either rolling, stretching or not being stretchy enough. I am so happy I was able to find this again!

I also tried the band with the silicone strip and I actually didn't like it as much- I found that this one rolled at the edges less! The silicone strip is definitely not worth the extra $10 in my opinion. If I buy another one, it'll be this version.

reviewText: Unique pretty jewelry set. Eagle is quite large & very detailed. Earrings are equally as beautiful & detailed.  My boyfriend gave his mom the earrings because she collects eagle items (I don't have pierced ears) I kept the gorgeous necklace for a display on my wall (I'm allergic to all metals & can't wear metal jewelry)  I gave it 4 stars because of the too short chain, so other people know. (I lost my tape measure) there is one short chain attached to the tip of each wing. Each chain is as long as a basic Bic pen, without the cap on & the extender chain is as long as my pinky finger.  Though the chains are short, it's too heavy for a child to wear & I don't wear choker necklaces, so I can't give advice on that. I do,  however, recommend buying this set because I've never seen anything like it & at the great price of about $3. The shipping was about the same price, but worth it because of the heaviness of the metal. I bought the golden set.
summary: Arrived quickly, considering it came from China

Most definitely worth 5 bucks. Very cute. I got several compliments. It looks great and sophisticated against tans and browns. Great pop. Doesn't look too cheap. It's not the most comfortable necklace I've ever worn in my life,  the hinges are a little jabby/scratchy but nothing debilitating. It didn't hang as low as I thought based on the mannequin photo but lord knows how big that pictured mannequin is. But I'm also not a scrawny woman myself nor have a tiny little neck.  It barely touches the first sign of cleavage on me. I like it. I ordered it in black, too.

They come from different places apparently,  one from America and one from Asia, even though they are from the 'same' seller. Thought that was noteworthy for anyone getting multiple colors thinking they'll get them at the same time or both in reasonable time. The turquoise arrived in about 5 days. Black says it's due January 20th (ordered like Dec 4th). Needless to say I'm happy with this based on what I paid. Nothing like cute jewelry to spice up plain but flattering tops that can take u from drab to stylish chic (that's my unconventional fashion preference, buy solid color plain flattering tops and then spend $50 on 15 to 20 different international costume jewelry pieces to put some flare on them and make it look like you know what you're doing and have a lot of combination ideas).... and at this price you'll never run out of cute necklaces to compliment plain stuff.

12/22 The black and gold one I ordered that comes from a different place/country finally arrived. It's crinkled and I can't really get it to lay. Going to carefully attempt to hang it with tension or place something heavy on it (hopefully won't crank the beads, they're plastic). The color combination looks cheap together unfortunately. Not too cheap to wear if you don't work corporate of sorts but this color combo looks significantly less quality than the turquoise, like it actually looks like it's made out of plastic, which it is. But the other one looks fine.
summary: I like it (I like the turquoise, look great.... black one looks a bit cheap and came crinkled)

reviewText: I bought a white shirt and this black one .... different vendors but same MFG. (Jeansian) The "size chart" runs pretty small .... I ordered the "American XL" which is what I wear ... when the shirt arrive I could not even button it. When asking to return / replace this (black) shirt for the next larger size ... I received an email stating that it's TOO COSTLY (sent China Post) to replace and that I should either "Try and make it work" or "Give to a friend" Needless to say it was a waste of money ..... if I wanted to "Give" a shirt to a friend .... I would have bought a shirt for a friend. Writing back to the vendor brought NO RESPONSE. I'm highly disappointed. Funny thing like I said in my intro I bought a white shirt with a different design and different vendor - it to arrived and was too small .... that vendor stood behind their product and asked me to send back the shirt (cost me a couple of bucks) and replaced with the next larger size. BUYER BEWARE and check return policy from the vendor.  03 JUN 2015

The necklace didn't keep its shape, so it doesn't lay as nicely as the photo.  The beads very much appear like plastic (which they are) in person.  I haven't been able to get it to work with a single outfit it just appears too cheap.  I continue to purchase from this seller because the statement jewelry is inexpensive enough that it is still worth it despite the hit or miss nature of their products (I have two other necklaces that I totally rocked at several events before the metal tarnished [paint rubbed off] too much and needed to be tossed, at an average of $4 an item, still a win).  The style of the earrings don't go with the necklace either, would never wear them together. In fact one would be better off tossing the earrings all together, useless and ugly.  I still have the necklaces because I thought there was potential, but maybe the necklace needs to be tossed too.  Still, two stars because one gets what one pays for, this I knew.
summary: QIYUN.Z is hit or miss (and always cheap), this was a miss.

What a wonderful surprise this purchase was!  It has a ton of beads on it - small and medium - but won't weigh you down.

 The colors are more muted than the picture, but they fit in well with this season's colors. The part with the smaller bead consists of a majority of turquoise colored beads so that part gives you a mainly turquoise "cool" feel.  The larger beaded area consists of mainly "hot" colors - red, orange, maroon, and yellow. And it all goes together nicely!

  It's quite well made and looks like it took a long time to construct. It looks a lot more expensive than the actual cost and could be worn nearly anywhere and with just about any color!

  Be aware that it is a choker and not a "beaded bib" as the picture shows or the written description says.  It fits close up around your neck but you could add an extender if you don't like chokers.

  The little bead earrings that came with it are the same size as the medium beads and are reddish and actually very nice and match the red in the necklace.

This is a funky and cool addition to any ones costume jewelry collection and I recommend it highly!

reviewText: Adorable! So bursting with color! I am officially only buying from Amazon. From forever 21 and even Francesca's they're 4 times more (not at forever 21) and break. This feels sturdy and is definitely attention seeking! If you like the image you'll like the product (excuse the image it was for Instagram so a couple purchases are shown)
Just like the photo. I really liked it.

UPDATED 1 Year Later:
So here were are 14 months after purchase... I still give this thing 5 stars. I never ended up wearing the ear rings (where are they?)... I have sensitive ears and almost everything I try including the stuff that isn't supposed to makes them get red and hot... so I can't comment on them - however this Choker necklace (I have a thick neck) is still kick ass and getting compliments every time I wear it. For a cheap $7 piece of jewelry it has far outlasted it's worth in price. After 14 months of regular wear I can say that some of the coloring on the beading - especially the beads that roll along my neck have began to fade or flake away - but even still the beauty of this thing prevails. It's a very interesting piece that gets tons of remarks. And it really matches with a lot of outfits. Sometimes I wear this cute little black top and it's just pops when I wear it. I'm not generally someone who seeks out attention - but when you wear this - it demands it. I tell everyone I got it from Amazon for less than $7!! And I have never had an issue with any of the strands of beads breaking. Now after a year of regular wear - if it does break - I'll be ok and just replace it. Hopefully they don't stop selling this piece because it's great. I totally recommend it. Best of luck!

This is so nice. I didn't think I'd like it but it definitely gets compliments and matches so many of my outfits! Even kids compliment it! Buy it! The only issue is it's a very short neckline. So on my plus sized body it's almost like a choker but i love it anyway!!!

reviewText: very nice all the jewlery is nice
nice for the price

I'm trying to think if there's something positive to say about this necklace and I'm having difficulty. Ok. This is the old thing I can think of. The pattern is truly lovely. After that, it's all down hill. I've seen better made and better looking jewelry in the dollar store. Most statement necklaces have tiny chains between them to allow for a little, or a lot, of movement. This is one solid piece, other than the chain that wraps around your neck. Now, that front piece will lay on each woman differently, it has to be made perfectly. You're not going to get perfect at this price. I've gotten some amazing jewelry at Amazon for dirt cheap prices, but even my little girls didn't want to play dress up with it. The metal is warped so the piece sits noticeably higher on one side than the other. Some of the stones are set "in" the prongs, and some are set "on" the prongs. If that weren't enough, there is a hard milky white substance on many of the stones that doesn't come off. PLEASE save your money. I'm sending mine back. I hope I haven't waited too long.

reviewText: Nowhere as pretty as the picture.

I wear this a lot because it is so beautiful.  The grey goes with most outfits and the length for a short women is still good (I just got an sterling silver 5.5mm (6 inches) Bracelet Necklace Safety chain for when I want this or other necklaces longer.  I love that they have the bling on some of the grey strands and no bling on others.  The ear rings, although I would not wear them for hours (I have tender ear holes - they never healed properly even after years), are just perfect with this .  The loops on the earrings match the necklace perfectly.  I have received many compliments on it! The reason that I rated it 4 instead of 5 is because I haven't had it that long but I feel like the flaked on bling is flaking off a little at a time.  That may just be me thinking that and it is doing that so DO NOT MAKE a Judgement on that - it is beautiful even blingless and you can DIY bling if it does flake!  For the price though, it is worth every penny, flakey or not.  I have been thinking about purchasing large fake colored gems for the middle of the necklace that would fit with the color of my clothes to bling it up some more but then I look at the piece again and think NO, it is perfect just the way it is!
summary: A Steal that will get you lots of compliments

OK, so I bought this last Christmas as a gift and it arrived mid January, which is what I expected. As far as looks go, it is big, and the color is just like in the photos, depending on the light looking sea blue to teal. In the beginning it had a definite musty leather smell, but that went away on it's own from just sitting out, you can still smell it if you stick your face on it but not if you are wearing it. I ended up not giving it away but I haven't worn it much so not sure how it holds up, I expect it to do well though since the metal parts are heavy, the clasp is really nice quality and the pendant itself is very heavy and solid feeling. It is really pretty, though the gems look pretty fake, but if they all fell out it would still be pretty (none of mine have fallen out though). All in all this looks like a much more expensive piece than the price, still costume but very nice. I wear it on it's smallest setting witch is like a loose choker, this necklace is an easy cheep way to upgrade an outfit, worth every penny.

reviewText:
The only thing I would like that it doesn't have is a wrist strap or somewhere to put one. If I could give it 4.5 stars, I would.

My new clutch/wallet is adorable. My old Swimmer pouch was pretty much perfect for me when I had the iPhone 3Gs, but my new iPhone 6s wouldnt fit inside.

There is no key ring, nor is there an eyelet installed, so there is nowhere to attach my wrist strap, house key, and key ring cards. Ill have to add a key ring to the zipper pull and attach it there, and hope I don't unzip my wallet and spill its contents (my phone, namely) just by moving around. The zipper is very easy to move and works smoothly.

A lot of reviews say that the pockets on the zipper side are very tight, and they are. I put cards in there that I don't need to move often, and nothing in the two pockets nearest the snap. Filling the pockets with all of my cards distorts the shape a little.

My iPhone 6s fits perfectly into the zipper compartment with a slim phone case.

It stinks, but it is a vinyl wallet, they aren't expected to smell nice.

The bead dongle is simple and cute. I don't expect the faux leather strap to live too long. There is no other pull on the zipper, so once that strap breaks, something else will have to be installed.

The bow is well anchored and Im not too worried about it falling off before Ive carried it around for a while. I suspect it would be vulnerable to being put into and taken out of a purse a lot, but I intend to carry it as-is.

And it arrived a full month before it was expected to.

This wallet is possibly one of the most adorable things I own. It's a little over 7 inches long,3.5 inches wide(closed; a little over 7 open) and, not too stuffed, 1.5 inches thick. It will fit SO MUCH MONEY. You could carry literally a whole college student's bank account in this wallet, it has like three 'hidden' pockets. My only letdown is that the card holders are very tight. Mind you you CAN fit one or two regular size credit cards in one sleeve, and it has 11, not counting the ID slot, but if you have punch cards or off size business cards they may be a weird fit in the horizontal sleeves(I had to trim my paper cards and voting registration). It was a bit disappointing finding this out because since you can really only fit a license in the ID slot, I had nowhere safe to keep my family photos. :C I threw them in a hidden pocket instead, they seem pretty secure. Good quality, doesn't appear to be taking on stains or falling apart at all living loose in my large purse. My clasp is working perfectly, though I saw someone else's had busted. True to color(the polkadots on the kitten are pale pink).
Overall I think it is a really cute case and worth working with the leather/plastic/whatever to fit your cards, even if it does take a few moments initially.
summary: SUPER CUTE! Lots of space. Small card pockets though.

reviewText:
I ordered this product on February 5, and it arrived to me on March 6. Not bad considering the fact it is being shipped from China.

Now with that being said, let's move along. I have been desperately searching for a wallet that had zippers so I could put my change in. I was a little skeptical on this because of its size. I do not carry around a purse, but I suppose I will have to be on the hunt for the perfect one. I decided to get this anyway because the price was too good to pass by! It is such a cute wallet and it looks exactly like the pictures on here. However, I am not too keen on the string and two beads on the zippers, but that is no problem. I will just switch it up later on. I am excited to add so many little keychain plushies!

I would definitely recommend this, especially for a gift considering how adorable it is.

I bought this for my niece. She loves it very much.

The size is a little above the average. Obviously it's not suitable for carrying at hand. My niece simply put it in her backpack. The color and design is adorable to a teenager. It has several slots inside that you can put at least 12 cards in there. Plenty of room for cash. Actually there are two slots for cash. I have suggested to my niece that she put some 1 dollar bills on one side and 10 dollar bills on the other.

And also there is kind of a backroom for other stuff, like girly necessities. Overall it's a good buy.
summary: Good one Nice color, useful, much room

This bag is made out of faux leather, and even though it is obvious it is not leather it looks nice. The thing I like best about this handbag is the handle. What is interesting about the handle how it can be easily changed from a long over the shoulder strap to a handbag with two short handles. This is very handy, I often find myself carrying my purses differently and I know I will use this option a lot. The workmanship is on the inside of the bag is not perfect. The bag had quite a few loose threads on the inside which needed to be cut off because they were catching in zipped pocket. The outside stitching looks neat. The two parts of the strap hook together a standard hook and look closure, my video includes a segment which shows threading the handle into the bag and closing it. Here are various measurements: 7.75" wide x 5.5" tall, sides expand to 2" when handles are in short configuration they are 10" long (measured from the purse center to the top of the loops) when handle is in the long configuration it is 20" long (measured from the purse center to the top of the loop) The zipped pocket 5.5" x 3", it does not open wide, it will something like a set of keys Overall, this is pretty nice bag considering the $15 price tag (price + shipping) as I am writing this review. This bag is provided by HDE. Ali Julia review

The first thing I noticed was that the bottom of the purse is made of a very thin material, there is no structure to the bottom at all (no cardboard/plastic inner base or anything). I can't envision putting even my cell phone or camera in there and not have the material wear down over time as anything of some weight you put in it will weigh it down. If you're planning to use it as an evening bag, it is on the larger side of evening bags. The chain isn't such good quality and I really think they could have done without the removable aspect of the chain. The removable chain has lobster clasps at the ends so if you want the bag to look good, you have to hide these clasps on the inside of the purse.

The turnlock at the front was also difficult to close without compressing the bag down. Also, the grommets came tarnished.

Overall great design, but in terms of quality, this purse should be no more than $10 max.

Finally, a lightweight robe for all seasons. I don't want a fuzzy or heavy robe, nor a collar that gets hair all over it or long sleeves that get into everything nor a wrap robe which never stays wrapped.. I wanted a simple cotton, with conservative cut and style. The sleeves stop just below the elbow, the zipper is a breakaway that stops about the knee but I never unzip it fully, choosing to step into it. The stripes are pastel with embroidery on the bodice. It hangs straight. I had a similar style that I wore for so long, years, it finally became thin from laundering. Hopefully this will last as long since this style is so hard to find. Wish it came in additional colors, I would buy more just to have them on hand. For the record, I wear a size 14, and am pear-shaped. I purchased size medium and it fits perfectly.

reviewText: Well made!

Received promptly. The colors are vibrant and it's sewn well. The zipper works fine, nothing scratchy.  The material wasn't soft which is a must for me. I tried the robe on and it fit well. I washed with Dreft on delicate and used liquid Dreft in a fabric softener ball. Came out of the washing machine wrinkle free and soft. You can either put on hanger to air dry or put in the dryer on delicate setting w/air dry. I've done both before leaving a comment. The price was fair. It's not too light for me. I'm 5'6 + 36DD + 156 lbs., (weight fluctuates) and the robe is approximately two-three inches above my ankle. The robe is roomy, but not sloppy roomy. The pockets are deep and of course, pockets are always useful. I purchased size large.
Hope, I've given you information that you find helpful.

I ordered a couple of these as add-on gifts for my child's birthday. She's a big fan of the Pirates of the Caribbean series. This pendant was very cheap in price and I figured that it would look like really cheap toy jewelry...possibly something that would get a laugh and be tossed out. I was expecting gold colored plastic that would look and feel really awful.  It turns out that she really likes it and even wore it out. The pendant is made of some sort of metal - not plastic - and while it is gold paint, the gold is very shiny (at least for now). It is actually much nicer than I expected and could be worn by a kid as part of a costume or just for fun.  I don't know that the chain will survive long and most likely the gold paint will come off the pendant...but it also makes a good decorative item for a kid's room.  It does take a while to arrive, since it was shipped from China by mail.

This is a really good buy, very realistic.  Handle looks exactly like the knives in my kitchen.  It's very lightweight too.

I wasn't expecting much with this product given how cheap it is, but I was pleasantry surprised. The knife does indeed resemble a real kitchen knife, even having a black handle with a realistic tang and white dots painted on. The blade, unlike almost any other prop knife, actually is in the shape of a kitchen knife. The finish on the blade is pretty close to what is depicted in the photo, but mine has a bit less weathering. The dried blood looks great and the plastic is painted well enough to pass for metal at a glance. You can always repaint it if it's not to your liking. The only problem is that the plastic is thin which helps the look but also makes it flimsy and wobbly. If you accidentally stab something I fear the plastic might snap.

Overall, 4/5, probably one of the best as-is knives you'll find for Halloween.

EDIT: After using this with my Michael Myers costume for Halloween, I found out that it may look TOO good. A cop pulled over and made sure it wasn't real, and a student at my college brought it up as well. If you live in an area of people sensitive to weapons then beware.
summary: Pretty Great, Especially For the Money

reviewText: Looks okay in normal light, can tell it's "knife shaped" in failing light but loses all the detail. Would liked to have seen it be a bit more rigid.

These are going back.

I purchased the set of 3 gold Huggies because I wanted the largest hoop to wear as my everyday earring. When they arrived, I found 2 of the smaller hoops had fallen out of the spongy slot but they were not damaged. I immediately knew that any hopes I had that the medium size hoops may also work for me went out the window. They were too small for my taste. Nonetheless, I was happy to get a pair that I could wear after spending around $10. The curved stem of the Huggies is indeed a bit harder to put on than straight ones but itr wasn't too bad. My left ear piercing is a bit lower than the right one and a bit enlarged as well so the huggie doesn't hang as pretty as the right ear. I found the weight of the 16mm huggies to be quite satisfactory. The comfort with huggies is above most other styles of earrings. I don't like to switch out my jewelry on a daily basis. I also like to wear them in the shower, swimming, sleeping, talking on the phone, etc.  So, comfort is of utmost importance. These pass the test with the exception of swimming. I haven't done that yet. I hope someone who has worn them in the pool will let me know how they hold up. My only complaint is that the inside of the hoop isn't polished like the outside because you can see the inner hoop very easily when wearing the 16 mm one.
summary: Comfort as heck and didn't cost an arm and a leg but wish the inside is finished off too

reviewText:
Don't be fooled. These aren't exclusively for men. I found them while looking for sterling hoops and I'm glad I investigated them more. After reading about them, I realized they would be a better option than silver because of the low maintenance. While I do still love silver, there's always the pesky task of cleaning them when they tarnish. BEHOLD! No special care needed with these earrings. At least not yet that I've noticed. If, in the future I find that they do need some special maintenance, I'll edit my post.

Here's what I love about these:
1. Varying sizes. Want something understated? Go with the smallest size. Have more than one piercing in an ear? Add others!
2. Easy to insert.
3. Comfortable. Even while sleeping.
4. Pretty secure. You don't feel like they could fall out unknowingly.
5. Nice finish.
6. Great price!

What I don't love:
1. I found that some of them clasp more tightly than others with an audible click. It seems like the holes or end ball aren't uniform. I am a little leery that one could come unclasped but it's not a huge concern because the whole earring would have to be severely jostled to come out of your ear. I don't know how much of a problem that would be for most people. I don't wrestle, play rugby, wear helmets or do any other activity where my head gets bashed around. And if I did, I'd probably forego earrings.

Overall I'm very satisfied with these. Hopefully my review helps someone :)
summary: I found them while looking for sterling hoops and I'm glad I investigated them more

I have been looking for some huggie earrings. I had my ears pierced many years ago, and haven't worn earring for a few years, so getting my ears accustomed to having posts in them again has been a struggle. Sleeping with post earrings is a mess. Posts always poking into my neck. So huggies looked appealing due to the design of the post wrapping into the inside of the hoop. (Many don't offer this particular design, you have to put the post into a very small hole on the end of the hoop). Got these yesterday and put them on. Easy to put in, they are hinged, so you drop the back side down, slide in the post, lift the back up again until you hear a tiny "click" and done! No more painful post pokes! Slept in these without a problem. They are 9mm inside and 13 mm outside, and there is about 1/4" from the inside of the hoop to my ear. I am earing both pairs together, silver on the bottom and the gold in the next hole. They look and feel awesome. They are stainless steel, so I don't anticipate any sensitivity to my ears. Great value too - two pair for less than the price of one!
Wear them everyday and feel great.

This week I read the other reviews and realized I should have ordered up a size. I got my medium today and it fits great! It's looser and more comfy. I could eat a healthy lunch and not worry about my stomach poking out! I love the pattern on this dress. Love the fact that it has a collar. Love the roll-up sleeves with the button detail. Plus it's light weight which is perfect for our hot, hot August & September. Even if this dress doesn't hold up in the wash (we'll see), it's worth the $20 bucks.

Absolutely beautiful dress! It is soft, comfortable, and flattering (especially for my hourglass shape!). It is also stretchy, so could fit many sizes (or those of us who's size fluctuates!) The neckline dips, but isn't too plunging. The bottom rests just above my knees (I'm 5'4''). The colors are so interesting and the style makes this a very versatile dress!

I would recommend ordering a size up with this one. I like the fabric and pattern, but I have an hourglass figure (42-33-43, typically size 10-12, depending on brand) and the XL pulls a bit in the chest and hips. The fabric is on the thinner side but that can easily be remedied with a slip or camisole. It doesn't wrinkle easily which is a lovely surprise.
summary: I would recommend ordering a size up with this one

The chain is quite delicate - I would not recommend wearing the pendant on this chain during very active periods. I will definitely invest in a sturdier chain before I try to wear it to the gym.

The pendant is absolutely gorgeous and well worth the price. The center stone in the pendant I received is clearly blue. As these are natural stones rather than lab-created, I would expect there to be a bit of variation in the shade of blue between individual items.

All in all, I'm VERY happy with my purchase. I would not hesitate to buy again.

reviewText: It's a warm material and it's keeping my legs nice and toasty

I have bought dozens of leg warmers trying to find a pair for my long legs. I am average height (by today's standards) but my legs are a little long and a tad hefty due to years of playing sports. In other words, I wear XL sized clothing made in America.

Until I bought these leg warmers I hadn't found any that would stay put or cover my knees, which is what I wanted them for. I have arthritis and my knees get very stiff and achy when cold.

I rarely get dressed as I'm retired. Most of the time I just wear a sleep t-shirt (Jockey Women's Plus-Size Sleep Shirt) which don't cover my knees. I find my new cable knit leg warmers absolutely perfect to wear with my sleep shirts.

I've read other reviews, of these leg warmers, that say they are scratchy and the elastic is tight or the leg warmers fall down. Don't be put off by these reviews.

I have tissue-paper skin. I can feel a pea under 30 mattresses. When I first put the leg warmers on I found the elastic tight and they were scratchy. Fortunately, I was dead tired, and my knees were finally warm, so I went to sleep.

By morning my legs had grown used to the feel and the elastic fit great with the knee warmers right above my knees. I now wear a pair all the time.

In the ad photo, it shows the elastic side down around the ankles. If I wore them like that they would definitely fall down. However, if you want to wear them over pants you will probably have to have the elastic at the ankles. Warmth relaxes the elastic so wear them at a height, where the elastic is comfortable, until it relaxes to the point where you can raise the leg warmers higher on your legs.

If you find them scratchy, after wearing them a bit, you could always wash them by hand and add fabric softener to the rinse. I believe there is also a special product available to help make scratchy fabrics softer (it is meant for wool fabrics. I probably saw it in an Acorn catalog).

I noticed that the Vermont Country Store also offers long leg warmers but at a significantly higher price with shipping, assuming you are a Prime member (believe me, it's worth every penny I pay for Prime). I have no idea how they compare to these, but the only thing that would make me order a pair would be a color I wanted to add to my collection.

I bought these to wear while I'm in labor, since last time I froze to death and I can't exactly wear pants.  I'm about 5'7", normally 130 pounds (presently 160 and gaining).  These have plenty of length to go all the way up my thigh, comfortably and with extra length to spare.  My only complaint is that they were pretty scratchy when I received them.  I washed them with some Woolite and let them air dry, they are much softer now.  I think they'll fulfill their duty splendidly.
Super soft! Fit great! I love them

These are super long (I am 5'3" and usually hover between petites and regular length pants) so they go the entire length of my inseam and cover most of my foot too.  But I love them because they are very cozy and comfy! It's hard for me to find legwarmers that really warm my muscles and these are very, very warm.

These go all the way up my leg but slide down to the kneecaps. That is why I'm only giving 3 instead of more stars. Sizing is great and stretchy but unlike other warmers, they don't stick to your leggings and just slip down. Still a nice color and works tip till the knee.
summary: Good up to the knee and very stretchy

reviewText: I don't usually wear hoodies, but I'm a big Lovecraft fan, so I bought this one. I thought it was too tight at first, but it is just the neck hole that's somewhat small for my big head. I love the hoodie now, and wear it to and from the gym. It feels good to wear too. The material is very comfortable.

I got this "Miskatonic Literature" hoody in "forest" for my 17yo son. It's a very nice classy dark green color. Not a 'Christmas-green.' He wears a men's medium but he's slim and tall so I got him the large, and it fits him well through the body and in the sleeves length. It hangs on him well. Not overly baggy. It's not a very heavy sweatshirt, but it's not a cheap quality either. The decal is clear and professional looking. Just like the photos provided. I would easily buy another. I just wish it was the price was slightly lower. It's still a lot of fun, and my son loves it!

reviewText: Nice silk-screen work and good quality.  I wear hoodies October-March.  This one is an instant favorite.
My wife loves it. She says it fits and is "soft and comfy."

Most often I get the question of "Oh, Miskatonic, what is that?" to which I delightfully reply "It's a pretty prestigious school on the east coast that focuses on abnormal sciences. Somewhere near Xavier's Institute, Adams College and the Daystrom Institute." If they continue to stare at you puzzled or smile nicely to hide their ignorance it is a good time to launch into, "Now do you have a moment to hear about my Lord and Savior Cthulu?"
Nice, comfy, and warm - almost no shrinking when washed.

I like everything about these vests but they do wrinkle when I hang them up in the closet too close to other clothing and when you sit down.  However, I really don't care so much about the wrinkled back since I don't have to see it.  The material is very soft and hangs beautifully.  The slight overhang at the shoulders really makes the vest look nice and all of the colors are nice for fall/winter.  I live in a warm state; but if I lived where I was constantly wearing a heavy coat, I'd probably put the vest on once I got to work so that it would not wrinkle from wearing the coat.  I'm also short and the length on these vests is just below the butt area, which hides a multitude of sins.  I purchased a large as I wear a large size blouse.  I would not order a larger size than usual as the vest would be to full and just add bulk.

reviewText: The first time I purchased these - one of these had multiple tiny holes near the shoulder.  The defectives were returned and then I reordered.  The fabric is very thin and lightweight - which is what I was looking for.  After reading several reviews I am careful when laundering - I use the gentle wash cycle and hang them to dry - and have had no issues.  These fit as expected - perfect to use over my cami dresses for summer.  I wish there were other color options as well.
Love that they are not heavy - do wish they came in more colors

I have ME/CFS and I'm stuck in bed. I wear the Free To Live cardigans over my pajamas. So comfy. Now it's summer, I got these. I hand-sewed the closed from mid chest to my waist. I wear them open like a trapeze top, or I tie the front tails in a knot to make it more fitted. I love them. I hand them to dry, makes the fabric last longer. I wool be back for more, wish I could get more colors. Like mocha, ivory or blush? I would also buy a short sleeve version if you made them. I would also love a three pack of elastic waist pajama pants from free to live. And 3 pack of little cami's. I love this fabric!
These are light weight and are perfect for combatting air conditioned offices.  They feel great, are a great length and cover those areas you wish to hide as you age.

reviewText:
I wasn't quite sure what to expect with this necklace, I have previously ordered this type of necklace from origami owl and I really like their stuff but it can get a little pricy.  This came in and is so adorable.  I briefly contemplated giving it to my mom but selfishly decided to keep it for myself because I like it so well.  The locket is a nice size, it's bigger than I thought it would be and I really like it, very shiny!  The charms are cute and I like that you can switch them out if you have your own charms you prefer or if you want to minimize it or just add to it.  The chain is very dainty and elegant, I'm very pleased with this purchase!  Shipping was very fast and it arrived in a very cute little giftwrapped jewelry box which is a nice touch :)  I definitely recommend this necklace and hope to buy more from their line!

I did receive this at a discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review.  As a busy working, pregnant mom I rely heavily on amazon reviews when making purchases and appreciate honest, trustworthy and accurate reviews, because of this I strive to give good reviews on everything I purchase in hopes that I can help someone else make an informed decision on their purchases, the discount I receive is in NO way influencing my review.
summary: love this necklace, great quality, very dainty and cute!

style.Color:: Mom Charm Locket - Silver and Crystal

reviewText: Great necklace with cute charms...even room for a few more if you choose.

This was a Mother's Day gift from my son to my wife and she absolutely loved it!  The quality is excellent and the fact that you can open the locket and change or add more charms makes it a gift that can never stops giving.  I highly recommend this locket to anyone looking to give something special to their wife or mother.

Love it! It looks fabulous! Very beautiful bra, made in high quality, fits the size (38C), very comfortable. Came unexpectedly quick from China, nicely packaged. Recommend it to my friends and family members.

This bra is beautiful, I cannot believe what a great deal I got. Compared to the plain stuff found in American department stores this bra is a work of art (and it feels a lot more supportive). I washed it on the hand wash cycle in my machine and line dried it, there has been no bleeding of the fabric and nothing has come unstitched. There is only a very light factory smell which should come out in the next wash and is nothing compared to some of the hot topic bras I've purchased in which the smell never seems to go away. For functionality, it slims the back and is very supportive, I love that it has optional slide in push up support so that you can opt to or not to have it. The straps are thick which is another thing I really like because it adds to the comfort and support you get. It is a bit smaller than the usual sizing you would find in American stores so I would recommend ordering a size up (in circumference not cup) just in case. This bra is a bra I would feel comfortable wearing under a t-shirt and isn't just for decoration purposes. For the shipping, it didn't take too long to get here I was surprised at how fast the shipping was considering it's from a different country. I ordered the gold as well, there was no difference in sizing or stitching-it was of the same quality just a different color.

Wow, the picture doesn't do this bra justice, in person it is absolutely stunning! The embroidery is gorgeous and I cannot believe it was under $15. This bra makes me look like I actually have breasts... Well, good looking breasts; it pushes them up the the heavens and gives unbelievable support. I waited about a month for this to arrive which I feel it was well worth the wait. I ordered a cup size larger as well as a larger band and it fits like a dream. Definitely recommended, I may purchase a few more in different colors.

reviewText:
This wallet is so great.  I needed a small wallet for a ridiculously tiny purse.  I found this after a bit of searching and then wondered what took me so long.  I have another one of these in a smooth lighter pink leather that I carry my government ID in for work.  I use this every day.  I have a larger wallet in my pocket book to carry my less frequently used cards.  This one is small enough to put in a pants pocket so a woman doesn't have to take her purse with her.  I love the bright pink color.  The pebbled leather feels quality and having had another leather wallet by this company for a while I feel certain it will hold up and look good for a long time.

I don't keep much in it.  Two cards per slot fits, but makes it feel thick.  Also, while the center pouch is zippered, I prefer to not carry change in it.  It makes it fat quickly.  I like to carry a small amount of folding money, a few credit cards, frequent diner cards, my driver's license and that is about it.  It would hold more, but I think it's thinness is it's best quality.
summary: Love the color and the size

reviewText: The wallet did not block a rfid card.  That makes me think it doesn't work.

This card holder/wallet does what I need. I placed on credit card on the lowest sleeve, another card in the middle, two coffee shop stamp cards on the upper one. Also I carry about $60 cash and one more card. I place ID and public transportation electronic readable card on the transparent pocket. The wallet looks quite full and I do not feel like adding more cards. At least it carries everything which I need to carry day to day.

The material is worth for what I've paid. This does not look like above $50 product, but at least it's not flimsy.

reviewText: I love this product!  I just purchased this darker colored mini-wallet to replace my light pink one, which has been worn down from my daily use of it. It's very convenient to use while traveling and the perfect accessory for airport travel, where you are constantly pulling out your ID.  I also have a full-sized RFID Blocking wallet that I keep in my purse for all my other credit cards and money.  I do highly recommend this product to anyone who is concerned about keeping their credit card information safe and who would like something small an portable.  It's the perfect size to slip into your pocket while running a short errand!

I have a great stewart/stand blocking wallet but the design no longer fits my needs.  This Stronghold mini wallet  is one of several options I bought to try out.
 So far I have used a test which has been pretty fool proof for me. Currently if I have my car's keyless entry fob in my pocket with the stewart/stand wallet my car will not open no matter how much I move around. Even if I put my hip to the door. If I put my wallet elsewhere the fob works normally.
I tried that scenario with this wallet and it was not the case so it makes me wonder. I'm sure many people can argue with my testing method and that's fine but for me I think it speaks volumes especially in comparison.
I am not able to return it because I no longer have the packaging. That being said the quality of this Stronghold is very good and I like the wallet.
summary: Not what I had hoped for

I ordered these after ordering what looked like the identical product from another seller on amazon (noonflower).  The first set I ordered were great, but I wanted another set more quickly and with prime it took more than 2 days to arrive, whereas Tai523 offered it with 2 day shipping for prime.  My items did arrive in 2 days, which was great.  The product is a good quality product but it is different from the ones I got from noonflower.  Both sellers have the same picture and I think the picture more accurately reflects Tai523's product.

-Tai523's were darker in color and had an iron on images that are slightly different in color and size.  It was the same characters, just different colors/size.  The noonflower characters are painted onto the fabric.  I did like the noonflower designs and colors better.
-The Tai523's have a terry cloth lining on the inside while the noonflower have the same cotton knit as on the outside lining the inside.
-Both seem the same thickness and hold the same amount and both have the waterproof layer, so they work the same in that regard.  They keep poop contained and generally I see wetness around the leg holes and am able to change my son without any other mess. Sometimes I don't notice and the whole fabric gets wet, but I haven't had any sopping messes even when he had a big wet accident in the training pants.
-The big difference is in the size of the leg holes.  The Tai523 leg holes are much bigger and stretchier than the noonflower.  I actually prefer the noonflower for my son as the leg hole is a better fit for him.  He is fairly skinny though.  He is 95% height and 50% weight.  At 34" tall and 23lbs, the size 90 is a good size.  It does poof out a little in the back, but that is because he has a very tiny bottom.  The front fits well.

Basically, these are great if you are potty training at home.  We are trying the montessori method and he's only 16 months old, so he is mostly wetting in these, but they are easy for him to change out of himself and if he poops they are easy to just dump into the toilet.  Although, it requires more frequent changing, I think it is easier than the prefolds and covers that we use regularly.  I think when he gets the hang of using the toilet more, these will be fine to wear going out of the house. He may still have accidents and need a change of underwear and pants, but I doubt he would make much of a mess.  If you are looking for something that fully contains like a diaper then these are not it.  But they do absorb a bit and keep you from getting too much of mess in the house. 4 stars because I like the designs of noonflower's better.  They are cuter and I think the paint will hold up better than the iron on.  I also liked the noonflower fit better for my kid, but your's may do better with Tai523's.
summary: I ordered these after ordering what looked like the identical product from another seller on amazon (noonflower)

I was curious about the company Leveret but there is little information online (there is a "The Leveret" kids clothing store in London that looks high-quality - I'm guessing this company is hoping people will be confused).  THIS Leveret is selling junk from China behind an Amazon storefront.

reviewText: Unfortunately the sizing of these pajamas is way off.

Due to previous reviews I ordered size 7/8 for my slim 6 year old. He has a long torso and I didn't want the shirt to be too short. I washed and dried them prior to his wearing them and they are just right. They are very soft, well made and he has plenty of room for growth. I typically buy Gap, Old Navy or Target pjs. These are a much better quality and less expensive. Will definitely order again.

After reading reviews for these, I purchased a sz 2 for my chunky eighteen month old and a sz 3 for my lean three year old so they fit as expected which is a bit on the tight side when first put on. In the US, children's sleepwear is supposed to fit tightly or be coated in a chemical to make them flame resistant. Flame resistant pajamas are typically made of poly or a poly-blend which these are not. Keep in mind when you order, that these pajamas are 100% cotton and loosen considerably as they are worn. I'll take initially tight pjs over chemicals any day. I am very impressed with these and compare the quality to a those sold at a well known children's store where they are sold at a much higher price point. I have since ordered multiple pairs in multiple sizes for my children and plan to purchase them again.

Pretty nice watch for the price. A lot of detail on case, with nice view of internal gears. Pictures shown are an accurate representation of item, you get what you see. Chain and case feel sturdy enough, I do not anticipate any problems there. Rear glass is truly made of glass, while the face "glass" is actually plastic. Only negative I can find, is that the hour hand can be tough to see at quick glance. Not really an issue, but it can get lost in the workings of the brass background. I bought this watch to use as my daily watch. I enjoy wearing a pocket watch, and I did not want to take a chance of ruining my Great grandfather's 127 yr old watch, so I wear this one. Best part is that Amazon provides a 2 yr warranty that covers the internal mechanism, watch case, crystal, crown, stem, and buttons .You cannot beat that.
summary: Good watch , at a great price.

I wanted to be able to show the grand-kids, the pre-electronic wizardry that makes it work. Of course I can't verify that all of the wheels, levers and pulleys actually are functional... but it is impressive to look at!  I also like the fact it is self-winding. That allows me to interact with it and feel somewhat in control. I'm tempted to start wearing vests and dress shirts just so I can place it in my vest pocket. Oh, another factor for selecting this... as much as I like my wristwatch, I prefer to wear a nice looking bracelet instead, saving my wristwatch for more formal times.

reviewText: Excellent product for the price.  It even keeps time!  It was delivered promptly and securely packaged.

This is a very handsome, vintage-style watch that has cool Gilded Age/Edwardian vibe.  The color is made to look like that of polished brass but it is not. The watch feels much lighter than it looks and won't weigh you down if carrying on your person or in your pocket.

A ring of Roman numerals are inscribed on the inner ring while the outer ring has a nice embellished floral design motif. The time is a little hard to read because the window is small (about the size of a dime) but you can pretty much figure it out by the way the hand points toward one of the Roman numerals. If you press down on the top knob, it opens and you can see it much better. It comes with a matching chain that has the same antique feel as the watch.

The windup mechanism is pretty cool because you don't often see windups these days (no reliance on batteries!) and there is a bigger picture window on the back through which you can more clearly see the gears moving around.  Very cool.

It's handsomely packaged in a brown box and the watch rests on a velvet cushion. Very classy and I always like how Mudder packages their products.

Overall this is a very fun watch that is convincingly antique for not a lot of money.
summary: Antique-Style, Lightweight Watch With a Gilded Age Vibe

reviewText: Fun to wear and it's a nice accent to a vest. No issues. Needs to be wound once a day
gifted

This case and the design of the watch are very attractive.  Apparently there also some eye appeal for the steam punk bunch, my 13 year old has commented on the watch and I suspect he has his eye on it.  I really like the front case design, in that the "peephole" allows you to check the time without popping open the cover.

This is not to be mistaken for a fine time piece however,  The stem does not have very fine tolerance, and I question how accurate the watch is and how it will perform over the long haul.  Not a family heirloom, but not a bad little item either.

This review is based on a complimentary review sample provided by the seller in exchange for a fair and unbiased review.
summary: Very attractive - More novelty than heirloom...

The ornate design with open windows on front and back showing gears are perfect for steampunk. It doesn't keep time well, as it runs a bit fast. 15 turns of the winder gives just over 24 hours of ticking. Even if this watch stops working, it will still serve for what it was bought for.

reviewText: I recently received this watch as a Christmas gift from a friend and I absolutely love it. The watch itself is slightly tarnished which adds to the vintage look and feel. The chain is durable and the clasp is nice and stiff (but not so much as to interfere with its intended function). You can watch the gears in the back turn as you wind it and the spring is visible from the front so you can see how tight it is wound. The clasp that holds the watch itself shut is stiff enough that in order to shut it you need to hold down on the button (ensuring you don't accidentally shut it). The face and rear are plastic (the front is slightly loose but for the price and beauty of the watch I really couldn't care less). This will be a cherished timepiece in my collection for many years to come.

However, if you are looking for a dependable watch without batteries, I'd recommend going solar or something.

It seems to keep exact time amd is just as gorgeous if not moreso in person than in the picture. If you are avoiding this product because you never use roman numerals and feel it will make time telling tedious then no need to worry. I was the same way, give it three days and its as easy as a digital watch. This watch is fantastic and will donits job flawlessly. The necklace is very light honeycombed metal with rounded smooth surfaces and is much lighter than the pendant that's hanging on it, which actually works out great, because it hangs flat and still.  The turquoise looks and feels a little suspect, but feels cold and mildly heavy, so I'm not certain it's real, but the coloring and detail looks great, but isn't shiny like the picture, at all.  It's more of a flat, chalky finish.  It's under $5, so how can I complain?
Earrings are a match, though a little understated. Mine have a few dents and some uneven background finishing in the black antiquing area around the stones, which means one earring looks a little silver, around the stone, and one has the blacker antiquing detail.  I will use a black marker to even it out and no one will know, except you guys!!
summary: Rounded Polished Light Honeycomb Metal Chain with Heavier Pendant, So it Lays Flat. Nice, Especially at This Price!!

If the  turquoise is real, try to convince me. I have several pieces of real turquoise.  Even in my earring pairs, the color of the stones don't match perfectly.  In this set you see 4 stones.  #1  the earrings are a totally perfect match in color, size, and shape.  There is only one minor difference with these two stones.  On the back, one stone is perfectly flat.  The second stone is concave on the back.  Concave as. If a liquid was poured into a mold.  Now for the necklace,  the glue that was used to keep it in the necklace piece.  Left stains on the back of the large stone.  The appearance is the same as putting oil on a porous stone.  And finally,  I broke open the smallest stone.  The color is the same, inside and out.  Plus I found three small bright blue things inside the stone tha.mt , to me, looks like something used to color what ever was used to make the stones.  I am not convinced I purchase genuine turquoise as it is mined!  I feel like I purchased man made stones
summary: #1 the earrings are a totally perfect match in color

I'm 4'11", 95lb. This is basically a pair of tights with denim and pockets printed on it. It doesn't function like a real pair of jeans of course. It's thin material, but not thin enough to show the color of my underwear. I find it comfortable. It accentuates my butt. Fits great!

A huge fan of these tights. You cannot beat the price and they look like denim, even up close. I love the black ones also. They are a tiny bit narrow in the upper thigh area when first put on, but within minutes stretch just enough to fit.  They could also be just a tad long but that is very minor. I wear mine with skecher "work boot" style boots and they do just fine. I've been wearing them quite a bit lately and have received tons of complements.  The fit is very flattering. Sure they're made of thin material, but it's strong and as far as I can tell, the material is opaque--you can't see through it. They are extremely comfortable. Don't be afraid to purchase, but be aware that these aren't made of denim which is part of the reason they're so inexpensive. You get more than what you pay for, but be realistic in your expectations.

I bought this hat for my 5-year old daughter a couple weeks ago from BB&B. after wearing it only one day, the tassel fell off from the end of Elsa's braid. Fine, I thought. No big deal. I went back to the store and returned that one and bought another Flipeez Elsa hat. Again, my daughter wore it only one day, and now the entire braid fell off! The rest of the hat is made beautifully -- very well-constructed, but that damned braid! The whole point of the hat is to have Elsa's braid move up and down. So, sadly, I am returning this one, too. Seems like there is a quality control problem because just by looking at the braid, you can see that there is only one piece of yarn that's supposed to hold the thing onto the rest of the hat. For the $20 I paid, I shouldn't have to sew pieces back together...especially not after only wearing for one day! My other daughter has the Flipeez dog hat, and that has lasted beautifully for over a year now. I'm returning the Elsa one and will look for another Flipeez design. I did include a video (sorry, no audio), so you can see how the hat works and how the braid fell cleanly off and was only attached by one string.

I still gave this a 5-star rating bc it's great quality, my daughter loves it, and I blame the rip and the piece that slid out on the popularity of the product and not on the quality.

My daughter (4 years old) loves these mittens, which is saying a lot since she is notoriously fussy about such items.  I think the little animal faces (mouse? cat? hard to say) helped, but functional features are really what makes these mittens great.  Specifically, she really appreciates the grippy palms, which are important for hanging on to playground equipment.  I also like the straps that allow you to adjust the tightness around the wrist for a custom fit.  The material inside is soft and free of irritating seams or bumps. I LOVE THIS scarf/wrap/sweater! I'm a writer, and I sit for hours sometimes, and I will get hot, then cold, then hot, then cold. This is great for that. I can wrap it around me when I leave the house and turn it into a sweater when I'm sitting in a cafe with a coffee and my laptop. I've even worn it while I was sick, and I would sit in bed and watch a movie or work on my laptop. A full sweater would have been too long and bulky, but this was perfect, just long enough to cover my shoulders to mid-back and plenty long. I love the extra long cuff because that keeps the bulk of the material out of the way of my working at the computer. I did stitch the arm opening up a little higher, maybe another 6-8 inches, because I wear it more like a sweater and I found it stayed where I wanted it better than way, but I'm quite short, someone else might fill it out better than I did. :)

It is also VERY soft, not heavy or too thick or bulky, and it washes beautifully. I DO RECOMMEND washing it on delicate cycle in a lingerie bag to keep it from pilling though. I also really like the color, a nice deep steel gray color. I've very happy with this purchase!

reviewText:
One size does not fit all.  I was so excited to see this item thinking it would be perfect for our California weather and layering ways.  I was wrong.

The wrap is sweater knit material and perfectly suited for chilly days.  I found the wrap actually does not fit loosely as shown in the pic, which is what I wanted.  I think it would work well for someone who is very small, perhaps even average--say size 10-14.  Any larger than that don't waste the shipping time or money unless you're ok with it fitting a little more snug across the shoulders in front and back.  I must add as well, it takes a little practice and finesse to drape the thing on your body.  I'm a size 20 and it fit me more like a bolero than a cute little drapey scarf.

If you're ok with a less drapey look OR if you're a smaller person, this sweater scarf is actually quite nice and warm.  If you're larger like me, then this might not be the best purchase for you.

reviewText:
Well I've had these for a while now so I'll give you some pro's & con's.

Pro's
The color's are beautiful! These bra's are way fun! They give you a bit more size on the bottom. Meaning they are a good push up bra. I've been told my boobs look bigger. How awesome is that! Great price for so many bra's! Received exactly as described & in a timely manner. Made pretty good for the cost. Comes packaged in a plastic bag so they are kept clean through shipping. Holds up well in the wash but I put mine in a wash bag & wash them in that. If you don't have one, I highly recommend you invest in one. They will save your bra's & lace underwear big time!

Con's
The round piece that holds the strap to the cup is very flimsy & has broke on a couple straps. Not a big deal! I just sewed them back on & they look great. The sliders on the strap always slid back down to the cup. Does not let my straps be as tight as I like them. I also wish they were on my back not my front. They don't fall off my shoulders though so that's good. Just wish the sliders would stay where I put them. If I got an A cup this probably would not bother me so much. They are, how should I say, cuppy. I wear a 36B & they don't form to my breast right. I would suggest going down a cup size. They still look great on, they just have to much top cup room. So if you like to wear low V-Neck shirts & you bend over, everyone gets a boob shot because the bra holds the shirt off your chest but doesn't hold your boobs in the bra. Not ok!!! This is the worst part about these bra's!  But again, if I'd gone down a size it probably would not be a problem. Moving on... on the side's they are put together with an additional  seam that has a flexible hard something inside so that it doesn't curl up on you under your arm pit. I wear my white one the most & so it has the most wear. This spot has started turning into my side & drives me nuts! I no longer wear it because of this & am going to throw it out. Time for a new white bra. In other words they are around 4-5 month bra's with every day use. But really, for the price, that's not bad!

So there's my opinion... I really hope it helps. Would I buy these again? Probably. You can't beat the value. It's worth it. And the colors are awesome! Was hoping for closer to, oh, around 8 months of use but heck can't complain.

I really love these, great support, soft and flexible. Only problem I have is I have a very small bust line I'm a C cup with a 30-32". Finding a bra is really tricky. But these are alright but lose. I do recommende them though!
